snippet.title: 四季の狂剣・神無絶景・前編 (Shiki no Kyouken: Kanna Zekkei Part 1) PV
snippet.description:
The essence of swordplay captured in the merest of buttons...
An enthralling shonen-manga-style epic set in the heart of Japan...
Battles in which the soul itself is at risk, featuring a myriad of characters...

In an alternate history of Japan, an age when steel could take a life without consequence, Zekki battles through a war-ravaged land, seeking to reconcile with his childhood friend, Shikinseki.

This is the first PV for when the game was originally launching in 2015.

myohu-kai Homepage: http://hoppeman.sakura.ne.jp/index.html
Kanna Zekkei Homepage: http://hoppeman.sakura.ne.jp/siki2/s2_top.html
DLSite Store Page: https://www.dlsite.com/home/work/=/product_id/RJ198345.html
